leadText.title: Personal consultation with an expert
leadText.description: About everything related to 223-FZ, 44-FZ and other types of regulated procurements

sideCard.title: When a consultation is needed
sideCard.text: Consultations will be useful to the customers and suppliers working within the framework of 44-FZ, 223-FZ and other regulated procurements

content.text: You have a specific question that you doubt the answer to
You learn directly "in the battle", do not have time to complete a full training, but do not want to make a mistake
You are worried about the correctness of a specific application or documentation
You want to broaden your horizons and learn about different cases such as your problem

items.text: We decide whether we can be useful to you, we select a relevant expert
We set a convenient date and time for the consultation
We analyze your situation within one hour using the online communication service
We give recommendations and steps for further work

lectors.title: Kuznetsov Alexander Vladimirovich
lectors.position: Chief expert of the training center JSC "TEK-Torg"
lectors.text:
Has more than 10 years of professional experience in the field of public and commercial procurement.
Author and developer of full-time and distance learning curricula.
Among the trained students are more than 10 thousand entrepreneurs, including SMEs, government officials and local self-government, Rosneft Oil Company PJSC, RosAtom State Corporation, Gazprom PJSC, Inter-RAO PJSC, Rosgeologia JSC.
He has more than 10 years of professional experience in public and commercial procurement.
Author and developer of curricula for full-time and distance learning.
Among the trained students are more than 10 thousand entrepreneurs, including SMEs, employees of government and local governments, PJSC Rosneft Oil Company, GK " RosAtom, PJSC Gazprom, PJSC Inter-RAO, JSC Rosgeologiya.
More than 10 years of professional experience in public and commercial procurement.
Author and developer of full-time training programs and distance learning.
Among the more than 10 thousand entrepreneurs, including SMEs, employees of authorities and local governments, PJSC NK Rosneft, SC RosAtom, PJSC Gazprom, PJSC Inter-RAO, JSC Rosgeologiya.
More than 10 years of professional experience in public and commercial procurement.

lectors.title: Chibisov Roman Sergeevich
lectors.position: Chief expert of the training center JSC "TEK-Torg"
lectors.text:
Lecturer-practitioner, expert consultant. An independent expert accredited by the Ministry of Justice of the Russian Federation, authorized to conduct an independent anti-corruption examination of legal acts.
Certified by the Procurement Institute of the Moscow State Law Academy named after O.E. Kutafina is a lecturer in the field of regulated procurement. 14 years of experience in the field of regulated procurement.
Developer of courses, teaching materials, assignments, tests for courses in the field of regulated procurement.

bannerText.title: At the end of the course you will receive

cardBottom.title: Description of possible risks of certain actions
Tips for the most effective resolution of your situation
